verses.name: Proverbs 22:16
verses.text: He that oppresseth the poor to increase his riches, and he that giveth to the rich, shall surely come to want.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:17
verses.text: Bow down thine ear, and hear the words of the wise, and apply thine heart unto my knowledge.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:18
verses.text: For it is a pleasant thing if thou keep them within thee; they shall withal be fitted in thy lips.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:19
verses.text: That thy trust may be in the Lord, I have made known to thee this day, even to thee.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:20
verses.text: Have not I written to thee excellent things in counsels and knowledge,
